sentences.en: ‘Have some breakfast.’ ‘Ta very much—don't mind if I do.’.
sentences.cn: “吃早餐吧。”“多谢啦—我就不客气了。”。

sentences.en: Grace allowed her mind to wander to other things.
sentences.cn: 格雷丝任由自己的思绪游走。

sentences.en: His mind was a haze of fear and confusion.
sentences.cn: 由于害怕和困惑，他当时处于一种混沌状态。

sentences.en: How very thoughtless. I'll give him a piece of my mind.
sentences.cn: 真是太没头脑了，我要告诉他我很生气。

sentences.en: I don't mind telling you I was absolutely terrified.
sentences.cn: 说真的，我当时吓坏了。

sentences.en: I don’t mind the heat, in fact I quite like it.
sentences.cn: 我不介意这么热，事实上我还挺喜欢的。

sentences.en: I have always had an enquiring mind where food is concerned.
sentences.cn: 我在吃的方面一向很爱探究求索。

sentences.en: I wouldn’t have minded if she’d asked me first.
sentences.cn: 如果她先问了我，我就不会介意了。

sentences.en: I've a good mind to write to the manager to complain.
sentences.cn: 我很想写信向经理投诉。

sentences.en: In the car she reverted to the subject uppermost in her mind.
sentences.cn: 在车里，她又提起了她最关心的话题。

sentences.en: It is impossible to understand the complex nature of the human mind .
sentences.cn: 要想了解人类思维复杂的特性是不可能的。

sentences.en: It is impossible to understand the complex nature of the human mind.
sentences.cn: 要想了解人类思维复杂的特性是不可能的。

sentences.en: Jim Coulters will mind the store while I'm away.
sentences.cn: 我不在的时候吉姆·库尔特斯会照看店铺的。

sentences.en: Meditation involves focusing the mind on a single object or word.
sentences.cn: 冥想需要把思想集中在一个物体或单词上。

sentences.en: Mind and body are closely related.
sentences.cn: 思想和肉体紧密相连。

sentences.en: Mind trainers are now part of a tennis star's retinue.
sentences.cn: 现在，网球明星的随行人员中有些是心理培训师。

sentences.en: Our therapists will show you how to clear your mind of worries.
sentences.cn: 我们的治疗师会教你如何消除心中的忧虑。

sentences.en: Somehow she'd always been a child in his mind, pure and virginal.
sentences.cn: 不知何故，她在他心里一直是个天真无邪的孩子。

sentences.en: Sorry─your name has gone right out of my mind.
sentences.cn: 对不起——我完全想不起你的名字了。

sentences.en: The expression on Dan’s face showed that he did mind, very much.
sentences.cn: 丹脸上的表情说明他是介意的，而且是很介意。

sentences.en: The Internet, to my mind, represents information exchange at its best.
sentences.cn: 因特网在我看来是最好的信息交换方式。

sentences.en: The opportunity had gone. His mind scrabbled for alternatives.
sentences.cn: 机会已经失去。他苦苦思索别的方案。

sentences.en: The reason for my visit had obviously slipped his mind.
sentences.cn: 他显然已经忘掉了我的来意。

sentences.en: They could interpret it that way if they'd a mind to.
sentences.cn: 如果他们愿意的话，可以那样理解。

sentences.en: This put me in mind of some-thing Patrick said many years ago.
sentences.cn: 这使我想起多年前帕特里克曾说过的话。

sentences.en: Whatever troubles arise, we'll have peace of mind amidst seeming chaos.
sentences.cn: 无论出现什么样的麻烦，我们都会在貌似混乱的情形中保持平和的心态。

words.tran_cn: 有意的；有思想的；具有意志的
愚蠢的；不小心的；不需要动脑筋的；不顾虑的
不在乎，不用心；没头脑，精神缺失

phrases.phrase: be of one (或 a different) mind

phrases.tran_cn: 改变心意；改变你的想法；改变你的观点

phrases.phrase: close (或 shut) one's mind to (或 against)
phrases.tran_cn: 对…不予考虑，对…置若罔闻

phrases.phrase: give someone a piece of one's mind
have a (或 a good, half a) mind to do something
have a mind of one's own
phrases.tran_cn: 有独立看法；能独立行动

phrases.phrase: have someone or something in mind
phrases.tran_cn: 想到（某人或某事)，考虑到
（口）如果你不介意的话；如果你不反对的话
记住，考虑到，想到；在心里；头脑中；时刻记住
在我脑海中；在我的心中；在我精神世界里
注意自己举止，避免冒犯他人
利用精神力量战胜具体问题
没有关系，不要记在心上
心理状态，思想状态；心境

trans.tran_cn: 思想，头脑，思维方式，有才智的人，心思，记忆力
trans.tran_en: your thoughts or your ability to think, feel, and imagine things

trans.tran_cn: 烦恼，介意，当心，服从，关心，照看
trans.tran_en: to feel annoyed or upset about something
